sqlMap.statement:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO, PRPTYGROUPID, PRPTYGROUPNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA09, (SELECT @NO := 0) R
UPPER(PrptyGroupId) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchPrptyGroupId# , '%')
ORDER BY PrptyGroupId ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA09
UPPER(PrptyGroupId) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchPrptyGroupId# , '%')
